headline: Club Crackers® and Kind Campaign Launch National Back-to-School Partnership to Combat Girl-On-Girl Bullying and Spark Kindness in Schools
summary: Club Crackers® is proud to announce a national partnership with Kind Campaign, the internationally recognized nonprofit dedicated to ending girl-against-girl bullying, founded by Lauren Paul and Molly Thompson. At its heart, the initiative is about reaching young girls where they are — in their classrooms, their friend groups, and their everyday lives — and reminding them of the power of kindness and belonging. Launching this fall, it comes at a moment when that reminder is urgently needed: near
